body.name: Universal Stroller Board Buggy Board with Detachable Seat, Stroller Glider Board Suitable for Most Brands of Strollers, Stroller Standing Board, Holds Children Up to 55lbs (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 31 mins
features: 【Stand and Sit Dual Purpose】The universal stroller board is designed with a detachable seat, which can be chosen to stand or sit on to meet the different needs of children. The removal and installation of the seat is very simple and convenient. The standing platform has a non-slip surface to enable baby's safety.

【Adjustable Stroller Board】Toddler Stroller Ride Board is connected by advanced Velcro, which can be flexibly matched with different types of baby strollers in a few seconds. The Stroller accessories can be applied to joggers, buggy,prams, uppababy piggyback vista, cruz and umbrella strollers. The connection is convenient, safe and stable, which is easy to use.

【Safety and Comfort】The 2-in-1 universal stroller board has a non-slip, comfortable, and soft cushion. The stroller seat uses the rotary button to adjust the horizontal angle of the pedals to accommodate strollers of different heights. Smooth and flexible wheels save your strength and energy to move the stroller by adjusting the direction of rotate easily according to road.

【Sturdy and Reliable】Stroller standing board is made of high-quality environmentally friendly materials PP, which is strong and sturdy to safely accommodate children up to 55 lbs. Moreover, the stroller ride-on board could be dismantled or hung on the handlebar of the stroller with a nylon lanyard, also could be folded to save space when put in the trunk of car, which is convenient and portable to use it during journey.

【Travel Tool for Two Children】: The size is widened and lengthened, allowing children to sit on it with a very spacious space for activities. Whether it is visiting Disneyland, traveling, walking, zoo, aquarium, or shopping, just install the stroller on the stroller board. They will like to have their own seats, and you can enjoy the whole family travel together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Universal Stroller Board Whether it is visiting Disneyland, traveling, walking, zoo, aquarium, or shopping, just install the stroller on the stroller board. They will like to have their own seats, and you can enjoy the whole family travel together.

Multifunctional Stroller Board The 2 in 1 stroller board is a sit or stand-up stroller that can carry children from 2 to 6 years old up to 25 kg (55 lb).The retractable connecting rod can be adjusted in length to find the best distance from the stroller, and the rod can also be adjusted in height to fit most strollers.The seat cushion is comfortable, height-adjustable and non-slip at the same time.The seat cushion can be disassembled to meet the baby's needs for standing. And can be hung with a strap on the handle when not in use.The buckle part is replaced with Velcro design, which is more firm and convenient to install.
Hold Up to 55 lbs Comfortable Cushion Safety Pedal
Sitting mode Standing mode Folding mode

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with it
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this. It is easy to attach to the back of the carriage. We use it for our 5 year old and our 3 year old and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: This will help keep my toddler safe as we cross streets with his newborn sister . That's what it's most important to me and such a great invention

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the Baby Jogger version
reviews.reviewText: We had the Baby Jogger version before and honestly I’ve hated it, it was awkward, didn’t like to turn, and bent easily under any amount of weight. We ordered this one before a trip hoping it solved all of those issues and it is AMAZING! The large wheels make all the difference for turning and movement and the board isn’t bendy at all. HIGHLY recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice idea, but doesn’t work in practice
reviews.reviewText: I have a Britax stroller that I wanted to add a platform to for my older child when we are out for longer outings. The idea of something like this is great, but in practices it gets in the way when you are walking and doesn’t leave enough space above for a child to sit without hitting the handle. Decided to return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Broke on day one
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our 43# child for a week long trip theme park. After about 4 hours of use the attachment to the stroller broke. We parked the stroller for a bit and when we came back and the child tried to get on I noticed it had broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like it says!
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old loves it! And it beats carrying them home when all of a sudden their legs are too tired to walk, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with Vista
reviews.reviewText: The poles don’t extend enough to even be close to the base to attach so you have a lot of lag in the Velcro straps. This causes it to slide under the basket, and dips low so it’s not sturdy or level at all. Plus how secure can Velcro even be? Not happy at all. Going straight to the Goodwill for someone else to use with some other stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: This seat attachment is a great help for those who do not want to purchase a double stroller for their 2 kids. My 5 yr old sits on it comfortably and likes it. Maneuvering and taking turns are also smooth. No problem. The only challenge i experienced is pushing it from behind. There's no enough space to walk behind it and hits my feet a couple of times. I ended up pushing my stroller from the side. Might buy a handle extension on my stroller so i can push it comfortably next time i use it.
